title: Spin Classes, Yoga, Pilates, Game Room, Sauna and Steam Rooms
posting_body: ['Luxury Apartments for Rent in Las Vegas, NV', 'Live in style at EVO Apartments.', 'Only minutes from Downtown Summerlin, NV, our spacious one, two and three bedroom apartments and lofts have been thoughtfully crafted to provide you the desert oasis you deserve.', 'We offer our residents an impressive selection of amenities and facilities.', 'Relax around our resort-inspired rooftop pool or soak in the infinity edge Jacuzzi overlooking the Las Vegas Strip and mountains.', 'Enjoy spin classes, yoga, Pilates or work on your three point shot in our indoor basketball court.', 'Head up to the second floor spa and fitness center for a cardio workout followed by some time in our sauna and steam rooms.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 75', 'OR Text', '75', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 635 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Quiet Apartments, Convenient Location', '- Energy-Efficient Stainless-Steel Kitchen Appliances', '- Quartz Countertops', '- 1 Gigabit Per Second Fiber-Optic High Speed Internet Available', '- Oversized 42" Tubs*', '- Ceiling Fan in Bedrooms', '- Private Garages Available*', '- Private Balcony or Patio*', '- Glass Frameless Shower Doors*', '- Pendant Lighting', '- Blackout Solar Roller Shades', '- Modern Aesthetic', "- Expansive 9' Ceilings", '- Distinctive Hardwood-Style Floors', '- Double Sinks', '- Oversized Master Suites featuring Walk-in Closets', '* Only available in select apartments', 'Community Amenities', '- Infinity Edge Jacuzzi', '- Hammock Lounge Area', '- Dog Park', '- Spin Classes, Yoga, Pilates', '- 4 Pools Throughout the Property (2 are heated year-round, 1 is an Olympic lap pool)', '- On-Site Dry Cleaning Services', '- Massage Rooms', '- Gated Electronic Entrance', '- Package Lockers', '- Complimentary WiFi in Clubhouse', '- Poolside Cabanas', '- 24 Hour Spa & Fitness Center', '- Open Air Rooftop Lounge', '- Volleyball Court', '- Multi-Use Indoor Basketball Court', '- Wet Bar', '- Coffee Bar', '- Sauna and Steam Rooms', '- Views of Las Vegas', '- Fire Pits', '- BBQ Grills', '- Business Center', '- Library', '- Game Room', 'Pet Policy', 'EVO offers a choice of pet-friendly or pet-free apartments for rent in southwest Las Vegas.', 'We have options for all of your needs.', 'If you do have a pet, we invite you to bring your furry friend to the community dog park after stopping by your EVO leasing office for their treat!', 'Income Requirements:', '3x', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-4:00PM', 'Saturday-Sunday: 11:00AM-3:30PM', 'Evo', '8760 W Patrick Lane, Las Vegas, NV, 89148', '2REfsJqj7Lzb']
